Reviews.Title: I had hoped it would be better
Reviews.Author: Reviewer
Reviews.Content: If you want decent clarity, don't go with an analog solution. The resolution of these cameras doesn't allow for clear identification. That is important in a security situation.

Reviews.Title: Wow! Clear vision!
Reviews.Author: DiDi Early
Reviews.Content: Have problem neighbors so we had to put up cameras, added this one and it is great. It is sharper vision than the other cameras we have up.

ProductInfo.Features:
See more with high resolution 700 TV lines color 1/3" Sony 'Effio' video, powerful infrared night vision & wide dynamic range for clear images in any light
Use the On-Screen Display (OSD) controller & built-in software to customize the camera settings for professional video surveillance
Easily mount to walls with cable threaded through the bracket for added protection
Fight back against crime by deterring intruders & protecting your property
Plug into your DVR for recording or TV's yellow video-in socket for immediate surveillance
ProductInfo.Name: Swann SWPRO-770CAM-US Pro-770 Professional All-Purpose Camera (White)
